ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Need advice for an off-hand weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a Smoldering Brand for 2 K. It s 9/22 +3 STR Proc:Burn (14 point DD.) That can be used in either hand, and is a nice weapon. (All/All.)
ygData.messageBody:
I got a Smoldering Brand for 2 K.

It's 9/22 +3 STR Proc:Burn (14 point DD.)

That can be used in either hand, and is a nice weapon. (All/All.)

"Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" wrote:

> Currently I'm a 45 bard using an Ebon Razor (9/25, +4 MR/FR/CR) in my
> primary slot (coz its primary hand only) and a Journeyman's Walking Stick
> (9/24, +4 STR/WIS/INT procs Tashani) in my off hand. I would like to find
> an off hand weapon better than the Ebon Razor so I can switch the JWS over
> to primary hand (that proc is sweet for bards). I suppose I could buy a
> SSOY but before I fork out the cash for one of those was wondering if there
> was something better I could get for around 2K plat.
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
